players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated Diana. Trust me."
Diana: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game. Let's work together to find the real mafia among us."
Bob: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. We need to be cautious since Diana has been identified as the mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
